item.name: üë§ Users

request.description: Update current user's profile (email cannot be changed)
Get all users with filters (Admin/Super Admin only)
Get user statistics by role and status (Admin/Super Admin only)
Create a new user (Admin/Super Admin only)
Get user by ID (Owner or Admin)
Update user role - Super Admin can create ADMIN users. Available roles: SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN, CUSTOMER
Update user status. Available: active, inactive, blocked, pending_verification

item.description: User management endpoints. Profile endpoints are accessible to the user themselves, admin endpoints require ADMIN or SUPER_ADMIN role.

item.name: üì¶ Products

request.description: Get all products with filtering and pagination (Public)
Search products by name or description
Get related products for a product

item.description: Product catalog endpoints. Public endpoints don't require authentication, Admin endpoints require ADMIN or SUPER_ADMIN role.

Apply discount code to cart (authenticated users only)
Remove discount code from cart (authenticated users only)
Merge guest cart with user cart after login

item.description: Shopping cart endpoints. Supports both authenticated users and guest sessions.
